scripts.dev: concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n SVR,ADM,WEB -c green,magenta,cyan "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:stok" "npm run dev:web"
scripts.dev:stok: wait-on http-get://localhost:4000/api/health && npm run dev -w stok
scripts.dev:web: wait-on http-get://localhost:4000/api/health && npm run dev -w web
scripts.build: npm run build -w server && npm run build -w stok && npm run build -w web
scripts.vercel-build: npm run build:web && npm run build:stok && npm run build:server
